--- title: pdpatch keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "New methods for pandas DataFrame and Series." description: "New methods for pandas DataFrame and Series." nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Install

pip install pdpatch

How to use

{% raw %} 
from pdpatch.core import *
{% endraw %}

Utility functions

{% raw %} 
df = dummydf()
df
col_1 col_2
0 100 a
1 101 b
2 102 c
3 103 d
4 104 e
{% endraw %}

Interactive Method .less()

Shorter methods

df.rename(columns={'col_1': 'new_name'})->df.renamec({'col_1': 'new_name'})

{% raw %} 
df.renamec({'col_1': 'new_name'})
new_name col_2
0 100 a
1 101 b
2 102 c
3 103 d
4 104 e
{% endraw %}

Functions as methods

{% raw %} 
df.len()

5
{% endraw %}

New methods

{% raw %} 
df.col_1.minmax

(100, 104)
{% endraw %}
